affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_group.brief_definition: 明确的指导；清楚的指导
（就业等的）咨询老师；辅导员；指导顾问
引导信号；制导信号；导航信号

bilingual.target: 我们需要一些初级的指导。
初学者通常需要更多的指导。
青年人需要更多的职业指导。

bilingual.source: Many people sought the auspex for guidance.
bilingual.target: 许多人寻求预言者的指导。

bilingual.source: He was obliged to his teacher for the guidance.
bilingual.target: 他对老师的指导感到感激。

bilingual.source: The students benefit from the teacher's guidance.
bilingual.target: 学生们受益于老师的指导。

bilingual.source: The superior usually provides us with guidance.
bilingual.target: 上级通常会给我们提供指导。

bilingual.source: He thanks the teacher for her patience and guidance.
bilingual.target: 他感激老师的耐心和指导。

bilingual.source: Many people seek life guidance from the Bible.
bilingual.target: 许多人从圣经中寻找生活的指导。

bilingual.source: The scriptures provide guidance for many believers.
bilingual.target: 经文为许多信徒提供了指导。

list.abstract:
Dedicated to my son that＇s about to be born
So by the time you people hear this record
My son＇ll be born
And I gotta teach him about life
Listen, to my little man, you can never have too little plans
Always bring your game direct, cut out the middle man
Life is full of sacrifice, for truth you might have to fight
Someone＇ll bring you down ＇cause they ain＇t livin＇ right
Be sure to use your mind, though, look for all the signs, yo
Don＇t want to make a move too quick and get left behind, yo
Be in command of whatever you encounter
Appreciate your blessings, son, you＇ll see what it amounts to
Obtainin＇ your goals, maintainin＇ control
Self-respect helps you to protect your soul
Never give up, always be ready to try
Walk your own walk and keep your head to the sky
Little thing now here you are
Starin＇ at me with those baby eyes
All you do is sleep, eat and cry
But one day, you＇re gonna be askin＇ me why
Everything I know, I＇m gonna tell you about
Anything I don＇t, you＇ll figure out
＇Cause livin＇ is learnin＇ and learnin＇ is livin＇
And then you pass it on
And to my home boys, who clearly understand
What it really takes to be a man
And what it means to be the head of fam
The ups and downs of life plus the choices we make
Causes to reevaluate directions we take
And bein＇ up in the club is mad fun ＇til they act dumb
And everyone still packs
It＇s time now for us to seperate the mediocre from the great
Keep all the jokers from the game
I＇ve played my position, so why don＇t you try to play yours?
I＇ve made my decision, plus you＇re in my prayers
My life is changed now, plus I got a shorty now
Mad responsibilities, it＇s like, I＇m almost forty now
All the young girls wanna swing, my wifey says, she wants a ring
I wonder what the next days, are gonna bring?
We must live and fight for the right causes and be ready to die
I love you kid, so keep your head to the sky
Little thing now here you are
Starin＇ at me with those baby eyes
All you do is sleep, eat and cry
But one day, you＇re gonna be askin＇ me why
Everything I know, I＇m gonna tell you about
Anything I don＇t, you＇ll figure out
＇Cause livin＇ is learnin＇ and learnin＇ is livin＇
And then you pass it on
Baby child, did you know?
Every since you fell out of the heavens
You make me wanna grow
So I＇ll share with you everything
Make little girls and boys
Grow up to be kings and queens
Little thing now here you are
Starin＇ at me with those baby eyes
All you do is sleep, eat, and cry
But one day, you＇re gonna be askin＇ me why
Everything I know, I＇m gonna tell you about
Anything I don＇t, you＇ll figure out
＇Cause livin＇ is learnin＇ and learnin＇ is livin＇
And then you pass it on
Little thing now here you are
Starin＇ at me with those baby eyes
All you do is sleep, eat, and cry
But one day, you＇re gonna be askin＇ me why
Everything I know, I＇m gonna tell you about
Anything I don＇t, you＇ll figure out
＇Cause livin＇ is learnin＇ and learnin＇ is livin＇
And then you pass it on

yingyinNormal.en: No. He was in trouble so I helped. And later he expressed a desire to run and I offered guidance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，他惹了麻烦，我就伸了援手。之后他表现出参选意愿，我就提供了指导。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you say you guys are working on the guidance system tomorrow? Yeah, why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你刚才说你们明天要弄导向系统吗？对啊，怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome, welcome! Hello! Shall we start? Shouldn't we wait for Luke's guidance counselor?
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎啊。你好！我们开始可以吗？不等卢克的辅导员了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: With his guidance, our second move was to ban any loyalty centers from accessing the OASIS.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凭借他的指引，我们第二个举动就是禁止所有的契约工中心登录绿洲。

yingyinNormal.en: Gentlemen. Colonel Williams, Sir. Just wanted to see how the guidance system's coming along.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生们。威廉姆斯上校，先生。过来看看导向系统进展如何。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, guys, it's just a guidance system. It's not like you're handing us the Death Star from Star Trek.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伙计们，这只是一个导向系统，别想得好像你们交给我们的是《星际迷航》的终极武器死星。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, I don't understand which social situation this is. Could you give me some guidance as to how to proceed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，我不知道这是哪种社交情况啊，您能给我点指引么？

yingyinNormal.en: What's this? Oh, nothing. Just some math we don't need. This is a different approach. Are you trying to get the guidance system even smaller?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？没什么，一些我们用不着的数学。这是另一种方案，你们是想把这个导向系统做得更小吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Are you sure? Yes. I may have lost my guidance system and my girlfriend, but I still have a colon full of yesterday's meals to keep me company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你确定吗？是的。虽然我可能失去了导向系统和女友，但我结肠里还有昨天吃的食物陪伴着我。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't shut down the comms, because we'll lose telemetry and guidance. And we can't shut down the computers, because we need to run the ship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不能把通信切断，因为我们还需要遥感和指引。我们也不能把飞行用电脑关掉，要不就不能操控飞船了。

yingyinNormal.en: We're typically 8 feet off the ground traveling 120 to 150 miles an hour, using GPS navigation that will give us guidance to within about 1 or 2 feet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们几乎离地只有8英尺，每小时飞行120到150英里，全球定位仪会为我们提供导航，精度能达到1到2英尺。

yingyinNormal.en: But your communication system was based on our guidance system. And sonar is based on bats. You don't see them hanging upside down in a patent attorney's office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你的通讯系统是根据我们的导向系统制造的。声呐也是根据蝙蝠制造的。你也没见他们倒挂在专利律师的办公室里啊。

yingyinNormal.en: It's really been... Margaret, you knew I was in here. Sorry. I just had some messages. Luke's guidance counselor, Luke fell asleep in class again. Haley's car payment is late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的... 玛格丽特，你知道我在这。抱歉，我刚收到了一些消息。卢克的辅导员说卢克又在课上睡觉了，海莉的汽车贷款迟交了。

yingyinNormal.en: And instead of standing around watching, you can help us build your smaller guidance system. And with all these new skills, you'd be able to fix any model train. You'd be the king of the train store!
yingyinNormal.zh: 与其站着傻看，你不如帮我们创建更小的导向系统。有了新的技能，你可以修好任何火车模型你将成为火车模型店之王！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: advice or information aimed at resolving a problem or difficulty, especially as given by someone in authority

examination_example.sentence: First of all, <highlight>guidance</highlight> from adults should never be absent during the whole process of young people's growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在年轻人成长的整个过程中，成年人的引导是不应该缺席的。

examination_example.sentence: The Department for Education's <highlight>guidance</highlight> says schools can charge only for board and lodging if the trip is part of the syllabus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育部给出的指导意见是，如果旅行是教学大纲的一部分，学校只能收取食宿费用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 判断错误的；误入歧途的
v. 错误引导；将…引入歧途
n. 指导；指引；导向；制导

word_family.mean: n. 指导者；向导；导游；有指导意义的事物；有助于作出决定的事物；导向装置；定向标记；指南；手册；指导原则

sense_info_list.en: advice or information aimed at resolving a problem or difficulty; especially as given by someone in authority

examination_example.sentence: The academy's <highlight>guidance</highlight> does not include specific recommendations for the dosing of play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究院的指导并不包括对游戏时长的具体建议。

direction_info.description:

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 指导；指引；导向；制导

word_family.mean: n. 指导者；向导；导游；有指导意义的事物；有助于作出决定的事物；导向装置；定向标记；指南；手册；指导原则

sense_info_list.en: advice or information aimed at resolving a problem or difficulty, especially as given by someone in authority

examination_example.sentence: Another runner mentioned the <highlight>guidance</highlight> provided by the organizers when asked for his opinion on the marathon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当被问及对马拉松的看法时，另一名跑步者提到了组织者提供的指导。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>guidance</highlight> provided by the organizers is clear enough．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主办方提供的指导很清楚。
